statements: DELETE FROM commuter_traffic WHERE station_id = 3 AND entrance_count = 100;
DELETE FROM commuter_traffic WHERE peak_hour_traffic > 200 AND exit_count < 50;
DELETE FROM station_usage WHERE date = '2022-04-15' AND time = '08:30:00';
DELETE FROM commuter_traffic WHERE id = 1 AND station_name = 'Central Station';
DELETE FROM station_usage WHERE station_name = 'Piccadilly Station' AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM trips WHERE trip_date = '2022-10-15' AND trip_time = '08:00:00';
DELETE FROM commuters WHERE commuter_age > 30 AND commuter_gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM station_activity WHERE station_id = 3 AND activity_date < '2022-01-01';
